data.lyric:
[ti:Summer Games (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Scorpion (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Summer Games - Drake
[00:08.07]Producer：Noah "40" Shebib/NO-ID
[00:16.14]I think you're changin' your mind
[00:19.49]Startin' to see it in your eyes
[00:23.24]I used to love a good surprise
[00:25.31]And now I'd rather know ahead of time
[00:30.26]You said I love you too fast
[00:33.64]So much for that girl summer just started
[00:36.59]And we're already done
[00:42.14]Yeah you say I led you on but you followed me
[00:46.82]I follow one of your friends you unfollow me
[00:50.26]Then you block them so they can't see you likin' someone just like me
[00:57.62]I expected more from you honestly
[01:01.10]Said you want a simple life and that's not me
[01:04.73]How you go from that to endin' up with someone just like
[01:09.93]How can you be angry on a night in July
[01:13.69]And be warm with me when it's freezin' outside
[01:17.10]You're confusin' me don't have me wastin' my time
[01:24.53]Yeah you said I love you too fast
[01:30.11]So much for that girl summer just started
[01:33.29]And we're already done
[01:40.84]I kept it decent I kept you sane
[01:44.37]I kept it peaceful don't lie
[01:47.93]I kept it decent even the secrets
[01:51.38]Kept it between you and I
[01:54.93]Breakin' my heart tearin' me apart
[01:58.42]Breakin' me down when I'm already down
[02:01.84]Breakin' my heart breakin' my heart breakin' my heart
[02:04.50]Breakin' my heart breakin' my heart
[02:06.35]Brea brea brea brea brea brea brea brea brea brea brea brea
[02:08.96]Breakin' my heart tearin' me apart
[02:12.59]Breakin' me down when I'm already down
[02:16.09]Breakin' my heart breakin' my heart breakin' my heart
[02:18.64]Breakin' my heart breakin' my heart
[02:20.49]Brea brea brea brea brea brea brea brea brea brea brea brea
[02:22.99]You said I love you too fast
[02:26.62]So much for that girl summer just started
[02:29.68]And we're already done
[02:34.65]How can you be angry on a night in July
[02:38.37]And be warm with me when it's freezin' outside
[02:42.08]You're confusin' me don't have me wastin' my time
[02:49.24]Yeah you said I love you too fast
[02:54.81]So much for that girl summer just started
[02:57.87]And we're already done
data.trans:
[ti:Summer Games (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Scorpion (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:08.07]//
[00:16.14]我觉得你会改变主意
[00:19.49]从你的眼神就看出来了
[00:23.24]我以前很喜欢出其不意的惊喜
[00:25.31]现在我宁愿事先知道所有事
[00:30.26]你说我爱你太快了
[00:33.64]够了 姑娘 夏天才开始呢
[00:36.59]我们就玩完了
[00:42.14]你说是我引导你 但明明是你自己关注我的
[00:46.82]我关注了你的朋友 你就不再关注我了
[00:50.26]后来你就屏蔽了他们 这样他们就看不到你给谁点赞了 就像我一样
[00:57.62]说实话 我还期待你能给我更多惊喜
[01:01.10]你说你想要简单的生活 但那不是我
[01:04.73]要不然你还是去找个那样的人一起过吧
[01:09.93]这七月的夜里这么热 你怎么能发火呢
[01:13.69]外面寒风刺骨的时候 你和我又那么温馨
[01:17.10]你让我搞不懂 别浪费我的时间了
[01:24.53]你说我爱你太快了
[01:30.11]够了 姑娘 夏天才开始呢
[01:33.29]我们就玩完了
[01:40.84]我让分手显得体面 我让你保持理智
[01:44.37]我让分手一片和平 没有谎言
[01:47.93]我让分手显得体面 就算有很多秘密
[01:51.38]也让他们烂在你我之间
[01:54.93]我心碎一地 我撕心裂肺
[01:58.42]把本来就难受的我彻底击溃
[02:01.84]我心碎了一地 碎了一地 碎了一地
[02:04.50]我心碎了一地 碎了一地
[02:06.35]碎 碎 碎 碎 碎 碎 碎 碎 碎 碎 碎 碎
[02:08.96]我心碎一地 我撕心裂肺
[02:12.59]把本来就难受的我彻底击溃
[02:16.09]我心碎了一地 碎了一地 碎了一地
[02:18.64]我心碎了一地 碎了一地
[02:20.49]碎 碎 碎 碎 碎 碎 碎 碎 碎 碎 碎 碎
[02:22.99]你说我爱你太快了
[02:26.62]够了 姑娘 夏天才开始呢
[02:29.68]我们就玩完了
[02:34.65]这七月的夜里这么热 你怎么能发火呢
[02:38.37]外面寒风刺骨的时候 你和我又那么温馨
[02:42.08]你让我搞不懂 别浪费我的时间了
[02:49.24]你说我爱你太快了
[02:54.81]够了 姑娘 夏天才开始呢
[02:57.87]我们就玩完了
